comprehensive_overview: gffread is a tool for converting GFF3 files to FASTA format. It extracts sequences based on feature type or ID, translates CDS features to proteins, and more.
core_features: 1. Converts GFF3 files to FASTA format. 2. Extracts sequences based on feature type or ID. 3. Translates CDS features to proteins. 4. Supports filtering by attributes or locations.
